about.title: About
about.description: is a modern web application for reporting and tracking public transport disruptions. Users can add and view disruption reports for various cities and lines. No personal data is collected.
about.openSource: Open source and free for everyone.

features.title: Features
features.list: Real-time disruption reporting for public transport lines and stations,Multi-city support,Search and filter by line or station,Vote on the accuracy of reports,Automatic report deletion after a period of inactivity,Responsive design for mobile and desktop,No authentication required; open to all users,Dark mode

voting.title: Voting & Accuracy Score
voting.description: Each disruption report has an accuracy score based on community voting:
voting.list: Anyone can upvote or downvote a report,The score is shown as an "Accuracy Score" badge on each report,Reports with very low accuracy are automatically deleted to keep the list relevant

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: No personal data is collected or stored. Only disruption data (city, line, station, comment, votes) is saved. Reports are deleted automatically after a period of inactivity.
